TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AnnotationGroup extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation

summary.span: 表示一組註解。

span.span: Represents a group of annotations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表註解的集合。The class represents a collection of annotations. 這個類別可用來操作相對於其他的註解。This class can be used to manipulate annotations relative to each other.

summary.span: 取得群組中註解的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of annotations in the group.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，在群組中的所有註解的座標相對於群組註釋。Note that the coordinates of all annotations in the group are relative to the group annotation.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖表區域的名稱，註解會裁剪至此圖表區域。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the chart area to which the annotation is clipped.
A that represents the name of an existing chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定圖表區域名稱，註解將只會繪製在該圖表區域的繪圖區域內。If a chart area name is specified, the annotation will only be drawn inside the plotting area of that chart area. 會裁剪註釋在繪圖區之外的所有組件。All parts of the annotation outside of the plotting area will be clipped. 若要停用圖表區域依附，請將此屬性設定為或空字串。To disable chart area clipping, set this property to or an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能設定的註解的寬度與高度，以相對圖表或以軸座標。The height and width of an annotation may be set in relative chart or in axes coordinates. 根據預設，會使用相對圖表座標。By default, relative chart coordinates are used. 若要使用軸座標，設定屬性設`false`。To use axes coordinates, set the property to `false`. 然後其中一個資料點或設定附註錨定或屬性。Then either anchor the annotation to a data point or set the or properties.
